api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The data entered was not in the correct format.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: An error occurred, our teams are working on finding a solution. Please try again later.
api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: There was an error in the email address or username/password entered.

application.description: Pix is an online platform designed to assess and certify the digital skills of French-speaking citizens (students, school leavers, job seekers, seniors)

form.mandatory-fields: The fields marked '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are required

errors.not-accessible: Oops, the requested page is not available.
errors.no-longer-accessible: Oops, the requested page is not available.

assessment.title: Begin your course
assessment.announcement:
Start your personalized assessment course.
Sign up or log in to the Pix platform and start your test.
assessment.details: During this course, you will be able to:
assessment.legal: Information about your progress will be sent to the course administrator so they can provide you with support. Your test results will only be shared with your permission.

evaluate.title: Assess your digital skills with fun tests on lots of different subjects, like:
evaluate.complement: The Pix public service for the assessment and certification of digital skills enables assessment of your level in five major skill areas covering current uses of digital technology.
evaluate.list:
'
  • 'finding information on the internet,'
  • 'producing documents,'
  • 'communicating and collaborating online,'
  • 'securing your work environment,'
  • 'etc.'
'

develop.title: See your results during tests and view tips to progress.
develop.description: After five tests, you will be able to see your results and watch tutorials to help you develop your skills.

certify.title: Prepare for certification recognized by the French government and the business world
certify.description: Pix certification enables you to showcase your digital skills to employers.

profiles-collection.title: Submit your profile
profiles-collection.announcement: Sign up or log in to the Pix platform and send your profile to the recipient organization.
profiles-collection.legal: Information about your progress will be sent to the administrator so they can provide you with support. It will only be sent with your permission.

certificate.title: Pix certificate

verification-code.title: Verification code
verification-code.tooltip: Communiquez ce code pour permettre à un tiers de vérifier l'authenticité de votre certificat

competences.informations: Your certified score was calculated based on the answers you gave whilst taking the certification. It may be different from the Pix number shown on your profile. When you took the certification, it was possible to reach a maximum of level 5 in skills and 640 pix.
competences.subtitle: (levels out of five)
competences.title: Certified skills

certificate.jury-title: Remarks from the board of examiners

header.not-bad: Not bad, but could be better!
header.not-bad-subtitle: A little more effort and you’ll reach your first level.
header.too-bad-subtitle: It doesn’t seem to be your day, but you’ll do better next time.

congratulation-banner.message:
Well done, {fullName},'
'your profile can now be certified.

certification-not-certifiable.title: Your profile cannot be certified yet.
certification-not-certifiable.text: To have your profile certified, you need to have reached at least level 1 in five skills.

finished.title: Well done, you’ve finished!
finished.description: Your results will be available in your account shortly.
finished.warning-text: If you are not using your own computer, remember to log out.

not-finished.title: You’ve almost finished
not-finished.supervisor:
Call the invigilator: '
'They must see this screen to be able to finalize your certification.
not-finished.warning-text: The invigilator has seen this screen.

certification-start.title: Join a certification session
certification-start.access-code: Enter the access code sent by the invigilator

contact.info: In accordance with the French law governing computer technology and freedoms (“Informatique et Libertés”), you can exercise your right to access and rectify your data by emailing

cgu.info: By clicking on “Start my test”, I agree to my identifying data, certification number and the circumstances in which the test was taken, as reported by the invigilator, being sent to Pix. Pix will use this information during the board of examiners’ deliberation to produce and archive my results and create my certificate. If this certification was ordered by an organization, I agree to Pix sharing my results with them.

certification-start.first-title: You are about to begin your certification test.

challenge.title: Test {stepNumber} of {totalChallengeNumber}
challenge.already-answered: You have already answered this question

feedback-panel.description: To report a problem, please call your invigilator and provide the following information:
feedback-panel.certification-number: your certification no. (in the top-right of the screen)
feedback-panel.question-number: the question number (in the top-right of the screen)

feedback-panel.description: Pix wants to hear from you so we can improve our tests!*

options.answer-not-accepted: My answer is correct but has not been approved

lost.label: I cannot find the downloaded file
lost.solution: By default, files you download will be saved in your “Downloads” folder. It may also have been saved to the same location as your last download...

edit-failure.label: I cannot edit the file
edit-failure.solution:
The file is probably open in “Read only” or “Protected mode”.'
'Click on “Activate editing” or “Edit document” in the banner at the top of the file if this is shown. '
'Otherwise save the file under another name and trying opening file again from here.

open-failure.label: I cannot open the file on a computer
open-failure.solution: To take this test, you need to use the LibreOffice suite, which is available free-of-charge for PC and Mac. It contains Libre Office Writer (equivalent to Word) and Libre Office Calc (equivalent to Excel).''Download Libre Office''

download.other: I have another problem with the file

embed-not-displayed.label: I cannot see the simulator/app
embed-not-displayed.solution:
Your internet connection may not be strong enough.'
'Refresh the page by clicking on the refresh button'' next to the address bar. Wait a little while, the simulator might display. '

'If it doesn’t, you can try again later or from another location with a better connection.

options.embed-other: There is another problem with the simulator/app
options.other-challenge-proposal: I have a (great) idea for a test to suggest
options.other-site-improvement: I have a suggestion for improving the platform
options.question-improvement: I want to suggest an improvement to the question
options.question-not-understood: I do not understand the question
options.picture-not-displayed:
Your internet connection may not be strong enough.'
'Refresh the page by clicking on the refresh button'' next to the address bar. Wait a little while, the simulator might display. '

'If it doesn’t, you can try again later or from another location with a better connection.
options.tutorial-link-error: The link to the tutorial is to another page or an error page
options.tutorial-not-accepted: The tutorial is not helpful to the question
options.tutorial-proposal: I have a tutorial to suggest

error.max-characters: Messages cannot contain more than 10,000 characters.

status.success:
'

'Your comment has been sent to the Pix project team.'

'Thank you!'

'

information.data-usage:
'

'Pix processes the data from this area to manage and analyse the difficulty encountered and benefit from your feedback. You have rights over your data which can be exercised via ''dpo@pix.fr''.'

'To find out more about protecting your data and your rights.'

'
information.guidance:
'

'*Make sure you write in this zone: for your benefit and the benefit of others, please stay objective and keep to the facts.'

'Do not enter any information about yourself or third parties, or any information related to health; religion; political, union-related or philosophical opinions; ethnic origins; or penalties and convictions.'

'

actions.choose-type: Select the type of file you would like to use

file-download.description: Pix lets you choose which format of file to download If you do not know which option to use, select the default option. This is the file format accessible using the most software.

skip-error-message.qcm: To confirm, select at least one answer. Otherwise, click Skip.
skip-error-message.qcu: To confirm, select an answer. Otherwise, click Skip.
skip-error-message.qroc: To confirm, please fill in the text field. Otherwise, click Skip.
skip-error-message.qroc-auto-reply: You did not pass the test. Try again or skip to the next.
skip-error-message.qrocm: To confirm, please complete all answer fields. Otherwise, click Skip.

already-finished.explanation: You have already answered the questions in your previous courses. You can go straight to your results.
already-finished.info: Don’t be surprised, it’s over already!

resume-campaign-banner.reminder-send-campaign-with-title: “{title}” course finished. Don’t forget to finish your submission!

total-score-helper.title: Why 1,024 pix?
total-score-helper.explanation:
That’s the maximum number of pix you can obtain when the eight levels of the Pix framework are available.'
'Today, ''the maximum number available is 640 pix'', corresponding to level 5.

You already submitted the profile below to the organization {organization}'

reset-password.succeed: Your password has been changed successfully.

send-profile.title: Submit my profile

errors.archived: It is no longer possible to submitted your profile as the organizer has archived the collection of profiles.

form.info: You can only submit it once
form.shared: Thank you, your profile has been submitted!

send-profile.instructions:
You are about to submit the score and skill levels shown on your Pix profile.
Any changes in your profile after this submission will not be shared.
Remember to check your profile before submitting it!

cgu.error: You must agree to the Pix terms of use to create an account.

email.error: Your email address is not valid.
email.label: Email address

firstname.error: You have not entered your first name.
firstname.label: First name

lastname.error: You have not entered your surname.
lastname.label: Surname

password.error: Your password must contain at least 8 characters and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number.
password.help: (at least 8 characters, including one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number)
password.label: Password

sign-up.instructions: The fields marked '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr> are required
sign-up.legal-information: The information collected in this form are saved in a computer file by Pix to enable access to the service offered by Pix. It will be stored for a maximum of 5 years from the date of the last access to the user account and archived according to the statutory period of limitation (5 years). It will only be shared with Pix and its technical service providers. In accordance with the French law governing computer technology and freedoms (“Informatique et Libertés”), you can exercise the right to access and rectify your data by emailing dpd@pix.fr.

skill-review.title: Result
skill-review.abstract:
You have mastered ''{percentage}%''
of the skills tested.
skill-review.already-shared: Thank you, your results have been submitted!

skill-review.information: If you have already completed courses on Pix, questions you have previously answered have not been asked again. However, the result shown here is based on all of your answers.
skill-review.not-finished: You can’t submit your results yet, we still have a few questions to ask.
skill-review.send-results: Submit your results to the course organizer so they can provide you with support.

try-again.title: Want to improve your results?
try-again.description: You can retake some of the questions

time-gauge.timeout-placeholder: You have exceeded the time allowed
time-gauge.remaining-time-placeholder: There is still more time to complete the test

page0.title: You can search online
page0.explanation:
If you do not know the answer to a question, 
you can probably find it on the internet.

page1.title: There’s no time limit!
page1.explanation:
Take all the time you need to finish your course. 
If a question is timed, we will let you know.

page2.title: Learning tutorials
page2.explanation:
Access tutorials to learn more 
about each question and progress.

page3.title: Adapted levels of difficulty
page3.explanation:
Based on your answers, 
Pix adapts the difficulty of the questions.
